definition: to give your support to a belief, policy, etc.
to throw something carelessly or without much thought
to give up or stop doing something
to leave your boyfriend or girlfriend and stop having a relationship with him or her
to throw something away
to touch somebody gently under the chin (= part of the face below the mouth) in a friendly way
it’s raining heavily
to bring food that has been swallowed back up into the mouth again
to repeat something you have heard or read without really thinking about it or understanding it
to pour something out in large quantities
if a vehicle or building disgorges people, they come out of it in large numbers
good quality soil containing sand, clay and decayed vegetable matter
a person whose job is to take care of a group of animals such as sheep or cows in the countryside
a bird that is kept for its meat and eggs, for example a chicken
any bird
neither one thing nor another
to let saliva or another liquid come out of your mouth and run down your chin
to fall in small drops or in a thin stream
to pour something slowly, in drops or a thin stream
to move the ball along with several short kicks, hits or bounces
a container with a handle and a lip, for holding and pouring liquids
a large round container with a small opening and a handle, and usually with a stopper or cap, for holding liquids
the amount of liquid contained in a jug
an offensive word for a woman’s breasts
a small shallow round dish that a cup stands on; an object that is like this in shape
a tool with two long parts that are joined at one end, used for picking up and holding things
a tool that is heated and used to curl hair
if two people are at it hammer and tongs or go at it hammer and tongs, they argue or fight with a lot of energy and noise
a mixture of flour, water, etc. that is made into bread and pastry
money
to press and stretch dough, wet clay, etc. with your hands to make it ready to use
to rub and press muscles, etc. especially to relax them or to make them less painful
a long straight part that turns in a machine, or that another part of the machine turns around
a thin pointed piece of wood used for spinning wool into thread by hand
a small pointed tool used for making holes, especially in leather
a sophisticated person
to make it possible for air to become mixed with soil, water, etc.
to add a gas, especially carbon dioxide, to a liquid under pressure
dried straw, reeds, etc. used for making a roof; a roof made of this material
thick hair on somebody’s head
after
a field in which rice is grown
a state of being angry or in a bad mood

a large piece of farming equipment with one or several curved blades, (= metal cutting parts) pulled by a tractor or by animals. It is used for digging and turning over soil, especially before seeds are planted.
a garden tool with a long handle and a thin metal blade, used for breaking up soil and removing weeds (= plants growing where they are not wanted)
to separate grains of rice, wheat, etc. from the rest of the plant using a machine or, especially in the past, by hitting it with a special tool
to move or make something move in a way that is violent or shows a loss of control
to make somebody unable to move because they are afraid, surprised, etc.
a state in which somebody seems to be asleep but is aware of what is said to them, for example if they are hypnotized
a state in which you are thinking so much about something that you do not notice what is happening around you
a type of electronic dance music with hypnotic rhythms and sounds
to keep somebody’s attention by being interesting, attractive, etc.
if something enthrals you, it is so interesting, beautiful, etc. that you give it all your attention
to suggest or accept that something is true so that it can be used as the basis for an argument or discussion
to praise somebody/something
to praise somebody/something very much
an outline of a plan or theory
a rough written version of something that is not yet in its final form
a written order to a bank to pay money to somebody
the practice of ordering people by law to join the armed forces
a system in which professional teams in some sports choose players each year from among college students
a flow of cool air in a room or other small space
one continuous action of swallowing liquid (= making it go down your throat); the amount swallowed
medicine in a liquid form
to give a general idea or description of something without details
to describe, draw or explain something in detail
to make you want something that you cannot have or do
to tease somebody by saying or doing things to make people laugh at them
a pattern of raised lines in knitting (= the activity of making clothing out of wool) or on a surface
the act of making fun of somebody in a friendly way
to fix something in a substance or solid object
to send a journalist, photographer, etc. to an area where there is fighting, so that they can travel with the army and report what is happening
to place a sentence inside another sentence. In the sentence ‘I’m aware that she knows’, she knows is an imbedded sentence.
an unusual trick or unnecessary device that is intended to attract attention or to persuade people to buy something
to take control of somebody’s property or assets until a debt has been paid
to keep a jury together in a place, in order to prevent them from talking to other people about a court case, or learning about it in the newspapers, on television, etc.
to claim or take something that you have no right to
to show something you are proud of to other people, in order to impress them
to behave in a confident and sexual way to attract attention
used to tell somebody that they should not be afraid of allowing other people to see their qualities and abilities
to behave in way that is too proud or confident
an exaggerated display of wealth, knowledge or skill that is made in order to impress people
a short loud piece of music that is played to celebrate somebody/something important arriving
a large amount of activity and discussion in the media to celebrate somebody/something
a container that you pour a liquid or soft substance into, which then becomes solid in the same shape as the container, for example when it is cooled or cooked
a particular style showing the characteristics, attitudes or behaviour that are typical of somebody/something
a fine soft green, grey or black substance like fur that is a type of fungus and that grows on old food or on objects that are left in warm wet air
to change what people expect from a situation, especially by acting in a dramatic and original way
used to say that somebody/something is the only person or thing of their/its kind and there will never be another like them/it
very easily seen
very bright and unpleasant
angry; aggressive
a device that uses electricity, petrol, etc. to produce movement and makes a machine, a vehicle, a boat, etc. work
a source of power, energy or movement
a car
stems of wheat or other grain plants that have been cut and dried. Straw is used for making mats, hats, etc., for packing things to protect them, and as food for animals or for them to sleep on.
a single stem or piece of straw
a thin tube of plastic or paper that you drink a liquid through
to try all possible means to find a solution or some hope in a difficult or unpleasant situation, even though this seems very unlikely
to be the person in a group who is chosen or forced to perform an unpleasant duty or task
to use a method of choosing somebody to do or have something in which each person takes a piece of paper, etc. from a container and the one whose paper has a special mark is chosen
the last in a series of bad events, etc. that makes it impossible for you to accept a situation any longer
to try to work without the necessary material, money, information, etc.
a small sign of what might happen in the future
a heavy tool with a sharp curved blade at 90 degrees to the handle, used for cutting or shaping large pieces of wood
a piece of thick material like a small carpet that is used for covering or decorating part of a floor
a piece of thick warm material, like a blanket, that is used for wrapping around your legs to keep warm
a toupee (= a small section of artificial hair, worn by a man to cover an area of his head where hair no longer grows)
to take help or support away from somebody suddenly
to try to stop people from finding out about something wrong, illegal, embarrassing, etc. that has happened or that you have done
